meanings.definition: relating to the cultivation of grapes
meanings.sent1: The viticultural practices in this region ensure the grapes grow well.
meanings.sent2: She studied viticultural techniques to improve her vineyard.
meanings.sent3: The viticultural expert joked that the grapes were getting a better education than he did.
meanings.sent4: The viticultural landscape painted a colorful picture of grapevines dancing in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The importance of viticultural knowledge cannot be underestimated in winemaking.

meanings.definition: the science or study of grape growing
meanings.sent1: Learning about viticultural methods is fascinating for wine enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: The viticultural of this area is well-respected in the wine industry.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for viticultural was evident in every lecture.
meanings.sent4: In the world of viticultural, every grape tells a story of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The book on viticultural was filled with secrets to growing the best grapes.
